page.title: 05A Day in My Life.
page.content: Not all my Saturdays are the same so I will just write about one.I got up about 8.00 am and took my dog for a walk. Then I had breakfast. After that I asked my friend to come over and then we played{cards}and after that we played on my{Computer}. After lunch I went{swimming}in my friend's swimming pool and then we played on their{ {Spectrum Computer}using a game called {'}SCHOOL DAZE{'}in which you are a{ {Schoolboy}and the idea of the game is to hit all the shields without getting a{1000}lines. Then after that I went home and then my other friend came over. Then we watched{television}for a while, then he went home . At about 6 o'clock I had dinner . After I went and got changed and then I went to my friend's{DISCO!}until 10:00 p.m and then I went to bed.
